text: kavurun (allāhva) viśvāsa kara, dæhæmi kriyāvanda kara, muhammad (nabi sallallāhu aleyihi vasallam) namin pahaḷa karanu læbū eya tamangē deviyangē sannidhānayē siṭa pæmiṇi satya (dharmaya) yayi viśvāsa karamin siṭiyōda, ovun (nodænuvatva kaḷa) napuru kriyāvan ovungen paha kara, ovungē tatvayada (deviyan hon̆da ataṭa haravā) piḷisakara kaḷēya
